de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.dimensionsimilarity

Class DimensionSimilarityMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.dimensionsimilarity.DimensionSimilarityMatrix
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DimensionSimilarityMatrix.FullDimensionSimilarityMatrix, DimensionSimilarityMatrix.PartialDimensionSimilarityMatrix

    public abstract class DimensionSimilarityMatrix
extends Object
    Class representing a similarity matrix between dimensions.
    Since:
    0.5.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Field Detail

      • PRIM_ADAPTER

        public static final DimensionSimilarityMatrix.PrimAdapter PRIM_ADAPTER
        Adapter class for running Prim's minimum spanning tree algorithm.

      • sim

        private final double[] sim
        Flat, symmetric storage. We use a lower triangle matrix. Basic memory layout (X = undef, S = symmetric) 
          X  S  S  S  S  S
  0  X  S  S  S  S
  1  2  X  S  S  S
  3  4  5  X  S  S
  6  7  8  9  X  S
 10 11 12 13 14  X
